<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Multiplayer

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks if the current client Joined In Progress.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''didJIP'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>clientDidJIP = [[didJIP]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[didJIPOwner]], [[exportJIPMessages]]
</value></part></template>

<dd class="note">
reports false in CfgFunctions with preInit = 1; even when the client joined in progress.
